pages.text: $(l)(Passive-ShipHit)/$$(br)Counterfire will damage a certain amount of random unknown opponent tiles whenever its owner ship is hit. Each Counterfire has one stat: Amount. It determines how many tiles are damaged. Each tile will receive 1 damage.

$(l)Tips & Tricks:/$$(li)If you ever face a ship with this ability, remember that 'ShipHit' abilities only trigger once per hit regardless of how much damage the hit did. This means that you can use abilities like $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/active/missile)Missiles/$ to deal more damage whilst only triggering the passive once.

$(li)Remember that passive abilities can't trigger other passive abilities. If you're lucky, one of your own ship's passive abilities may end up taking out a ship that has this passive ability, in which case this passive doesn't trigger!$(li)Just like $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/active/salvo)Salvos/$, Counterfire only deals 1 damage to $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/passive/energy_shield)Energy Shields/$ regardless of how much of the ability actually hit the shield.
